items.sentence: I\'ve asked myself that question a million times.
Tom is dressed a little more casually than usual.
Tom is exhausted from shopping all day with Mary.
Tom is giving a concert at the end of this month.
Tom is hoping that he can hitch a ride to Boston.
Tom is in the living room, sleeping on the couch.
I had a crush on you when we were in high school.
I have trouble telling Tom and his brother apart.
I bought this at a flea market for three dollars.
I bought three apples, some eggs and some yogurt.
